basics.name: Xiaotian Liu
basics.label: PhD Candidate in Marketing
basics.summary: PhD Candidate in Marketing at The University of Queensland. Research on AI, service robots, and digital platforms in consumer decision-making and prosocial outcomes.

work.summary: Courses: MKTG3506 Digital Marketing and Social Media; MKTG7510 Market and Consumer Research. Focus on digital marketing strategy, SEO/SEM, social media, analytics, and responsible AI use in marketing.
Led student surveys and focus groups for EQUIS accreditation; synthesized findings into the official Student Report.
Delivered remote tutorials during COVID-19 transition for La Trobe University curriculum (Digital Business, Climate Change Economics).
Introduction to Management and International Marketing. Developed teaching materials and supported grading and student consultation.
